channel.title: Changing an item's picture
channel.description:
I'm horrible with clients, so I don't have any idea on how to fix this.
I have galkon's client and I want to change a few item's pics to what it should be, is it possible/how do I do it?
For example my Seed Dibber looks like this: [img]http://i269.photobucket.com/albums/jj65/EC_LeAdEr_S1lver/weird.jpg[/img] instead of this: [img]http://www.tip.it/runescape/item2/Seed_dibber.gif[/img]. Plus when I drop it looks different (looks like a skillcape floating).
Thanks in advance, help greatly appreciated.

item.title: Changing an item's picture
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

your seed dibber mode has been replaced by that skillcape, replace the skillcape with the seed dibber model and youre good.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing an item's picture
item.dc:creator: @Piled_by_Noobs Piled by Noobs
item.description:
@Piled_by_Noobs wrote:

[quote=“Rockin, post:6, topic:324424”]Well, I don’t know where I could find that. It isn’t in my class8 that’s for sure.[/quote] Oh, well idk what to say then :/… Maybe the cache is edited? Tom’s Cache Suite is a tool that lets you view/edit your client’s cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing an item's picture
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

Well, I don’t know where I could find that. It isn’t in my class8 that’s for sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing an item's picture
item.dc:creator: @Piled_by_Noobs Piled by Noobs
item.description:
@Piled_by_Noobs wrote:

[quote=“Rockin, post:4, topic:324424”][quote author=Piled by Noobs link=topic=420824.msg3090948#msg3090948 date=1262900449]
Yes, in Class8.java. And, that image is a skillcape, it’s rotated and zoomed.
[/quote]

Ok, I went through my item dump and I pasted this into my Class8.java (didn’t have one so I made one in the folder). I used this:

if(i == 5343){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = null; class8.aString170 = Seed dibber; class8.aByteArray178 = "Use this to plant seeds with.".getBytes(); class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 7199;//Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 970; class8.anInt190 = 408; class8.anInt198 = 240; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -4; class8.anInt194 = -3; class8.anInt165 = 7124;//Male Wield View class8.anInt200 = 7124;//Female Wield View class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }

But, it’s still the same icon

And yes, I did compile, restart the client ect…[/quote]
Try finding a custom item that has the ID that the Seed dibber uses and either change the ID or delete the item.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing an item's picture
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

Piled by Noobs:

Yes, in Class8.java. And, that image is a skillcape, it’s rotated and zoomed.

Ok, I went through my item dump and I pasted this into my Class8.java (didn’t have one so I made one in the folder). I used this:

if(i == 5343){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = null; class8.aString170 = Seed dibber; class8.aByteArray178 = "Use this to plant seeds with.".getBytes(); class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 7199;//Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 970; class8.anInt190 = 408; class8.anInt198 = 240; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -4; class8.anInt194 = -3; class8.anInt165 = 7124;//Male Wield View class8.anInt200 = 7124;//Female Wield View class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }

But, it’s still the same icon

And yes, I did compile, restart the client ect…

Read full topic

item.title: Changing an item's picture
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

The reason as to why this is because some models might of been replaced by other custom items and that’s why the seed dibber looks like that.

Read full topic
